text:
Jeremy Earl, who recently became a father, says Woods' latest album was influenced by a lack of sleep. "Those first few months or first year of having a newborn kind of put me in a dreamlike state," he says. 

"And that was my escape: to start writing."
https://t.co/yUmURjXVI6

text:
Sheltering in place isn't new for kids who live in areas affected by gun violence. 

At one St. Louis day care center, "Dora the Explorer!" is code to drop to the floor in case gunfire erupts nearby.

But dealing with the emotional toll is more complex. https://t.co/G33kw2AtxE
